posts.post_content:
Up for sale is this super sharp (as you would expect from an EX-NM card!) Murphy throwing, graded SGC 6. Hate to let this one go - one of my prettiest cards, but sacrifices have to be made to finish my "next 16"!

$450 shipped via tracked USPS First Class. Price is net to me, multiple payment methods accepted.

[IMG]https://i.imgur.com/JHkhpSg.png[/IMG]
Im too slow, nice card at a fair price.
That makes two of us, Robert! Too slow. Beautiful card!  Trent King
